bibdata.title: AIEE Report on Aircraft Electric System Guide
AIEE Report on Aircraft Electric System Guide

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Preparation of material incorporated in this report has been undertaken by the AIEE in the belief that it will materially aid in the realization of a better aircraft electric system. This conviction is confirmed by opinions expressed in joint meetings, including representation from SAE, NASC, NEMA, Army Air Forces, and the Bureau of Aeronautics.

Preparation of material incorporated in this report has been undertaken by the AIEE. in the belief that it will materially aid in the realization of a better aircraft electric system. This conviction is confirmed by opinions expressed in joint meetings, including representation from SAE, NASC, NEMA, Army Air Forces, and the Bureau of Aeronautics.
